ðŸ“– Summary: Pinstr is a decentralized social network built on the Nostr protocol, enabling users to curate and share their interests through customizable boards. It offers features like creating public boards, liking/commenting on other users' content, and attaching Nostr profiles and notes to boards, all while being open-source and free to use.
